credit_line: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
dimensions: Frame H x W: 55.9 x 76.2 cm (22 x 30 in.)
title: Sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased at Drake Sale, American Art Galleries Cat. #800, 1913.
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in chain stitch on plain weave foundation
description: At the top, an eagle with spread wings is perched atop a shield, with flags and buntings, surrounded by floral sprays. At the bottom is a landscape with a small town, a locomotive, and a horse and carriage. In the center is the inscription: John the Hoog O Love Remember me Margaret Hoog Married 1875 June 3, surrounded by birds and flowers. The entire surface is covered with chain stitch embroidery.
name: Sampler
